alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Florence, southwestern Dillon and northwestern Marion Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blue Brick, or near Marion. This storm was drifting north. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Latta, Sellers, Oak Grove and Blue Brick. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 177 and 185. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
